word: H2659 - חָפֵר - châphêr - khaw-fare' - Be ashamed - வெட்கப்படு

sections.paragraph: வினைச்சொல் - வெட்கம் உண்டாக்கு, இலச்சை உண்டாக்கு, வெட்கப்படு, கலங்கு, இலச்சையடை, வெட்டு
to be ashamed, to be confounded, to be abashed, to feel abashed
a) (Qal) to be ashamed, to be abashed
b) (Hiphil) to display shame, to demonstrate shame, to cause embarrassment

ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: A primitive root (perhaps rather the same as H2658 through the idea of detection): to blush; figuratively to be ashamed, disappointed; causatively to shame, reproach: - be ashamed, be confounded, be brought to confusion (unto shame), come (be put to) shame, bring reproach.
Cognate: H2659, H6548
